reviewtext: Finally, I have found a headset with a 2.5mm plug which actually works and with which the folks on the other end of the phone can hear me.  I bought this for my corded office phone, not a mobile or cordless phone, and it works great.  I really wanted a headset with the 2.5mm plug, and this is the ONLY one I have found which works well enough for me and has adjustable mic input.  Not sure about durability yet.  Quality seems okay, cord does seem somewhat thin.
